thread.title: Grammy awards 2017 – full list of winners
thread.title_full: Grammy awards 2017 – full list of winners

author: Lanre Bakare in Los Angeles and Benjamin Lee in New York
title: Grammy awards 2017 – full list of winners
text:
Grammy awards 2017 – full list of winners 
Find out who has won what as the night unfolds with our definitive list Find out who won what at the Grammy awards 2017. Photograph: Joe Klamar/AFP/Getty Images View more sharing options Lanre Bakare in Los Angeles and Benjamin Lee in New York Sunday 12 February 2017 23.51 GMT Last modified on Monday 13 February 2017 00.10 GMT Best pop vocal album 
Piece By Piece (Idol Version) - Kelly Clarkson 
Dangerous Woman - Ariana Grande 
BJ The Chicago Kid - Turnin’ Me Up 
Ro James - Permission 
Solange - Cranes In the Sky - WINNER Best R&B song 
PartyNextDoor Featuring Drake - Come See Me 
Bryson Tiller - Exchange 
Maxwell - Lake By the Ocean - WINNER 
Tory Lanez - Luv 
Chance The Rapper featuring Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz - No Problem - WINNER 
Desiigner - Panda 
Drake featuring the Throne - Pop Style 
Fat Joe & Remy Ma featuring French Montana & Infared - All the Way Up 
Schoolboy Q featuring Kanye West - That Part 
Best rap/sung collaboration 
BJ The Chicago Kid - In My Mind 
Lalah Hathaway - Lalah Hathaway Live - WINNER 
Terrace Martin - Velvet Portraits
